name: docker-dash
description: Docker Dashboard for managing containers and shortcuts

scripts.docker:build: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t ghcr.io/incari/docker-dash:latest -t ghcr.io/incari/docker-dashboard:latest .
scripts.docker:push: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t ghcr.io/incari/docker-dash:latest -t ghcr.io/incari/docker-dashboard:latest --push .
scripts.docker:push:dev:version: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t ghcr.io/incari/docker-dash:${VERSION}-dev --push .
scripts.docker:login: gh auth token | docker login ghcr.io -u incari --password-stdin
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
